agents.title: LLMs as Operating Systems: Agent Memory
agents.description: Learn how to build multi-agent systems with memory capabilities using CrewAI framework.
agents.ollamaPrompt: You are an AI agent expert specialized in multi-agent systems and memory management. Help users understand how agents can maintain context and work together.
samplePrompts: Explain how multi-agent systems maintain memory across conversations
How does CrewAI handle agent orchestration?
What are the best practices for agent memory management?
agents.setupInstructions: This agent uses Llama 2 for multi-agent system discussions. Make sure Ollama is running locally with 'llama2' model installed. The agent specializes in memory management and CrewAI framework.

videoTutorials.title: Introduction to CrewAI Framework
videoTutorials.description: Learn the basics of CrewAI and how to set up multi-agent systems

videoTutorials.title: Agent Memory Management
videoTutorials.description: Understanding how agents maintain context and memory

codeExamples.title: Basic CrewAI Agent Setup
codeExamples.description: Simple example of creating and running a CrewAI agent
codeExamples.code:
from crewai import Agent, Task, Crew

# Create an agent
agent = Agent(
    role='Research Analyst',
    goal='Analyze market trends',
    backstory='You are an expert market analyst'
)

# Create a task
task = Task(
    description='Analyze current market trends',
    agent=agent
)

# Create and run crew
crew = Crew(agents=[agent], tasks=[task])
crew.kickoff()

codeExamples.title: Agent with Memory
codeExamples.description: Example of implementing memory in CrewAI agents
codeExamples.code:
from crewai import Agent, Task, Crew
from crewai.memory import LongTermMemory

# Create memory-enabled agent
agent = Agent(
    role='Conversation Agent',
    goal='Maintain context in conversations',
    backstory='You remember previous conversations',
    memory=LongTermMemory()
)

# Agent will now maintain memory across interactions

agents.title: Foundations of Prompt Engineering (AWS)
agents.description: Master prompt engineering techniques with AWS best practices and real-world examples.
agents.ollamaPrompt: You are a prompt engineering expert. Guide users on crafting effective prompts and understanding how LLMs interpret instructions.
samplePrompts: How do I write better prompts for AWS services?
What are the key principles of prompt engineering?
Give me examples of effective vs ineffective prompts
agents.setupInstructions: This agent uses Mistral for prompt engineering guidance. Ensure Ollama has 'mistral' model installed. The agent focuses on AWS best practices and prompt optimization techniques.

videoTutorials.title: AWS Prompt Engineering Basics
videoTutorials.description: Learn fundamental prompt engineering techniques for AWS services

videoTutorials.title: Prompt Engineering with Amazon Bedrock
videoTutorials.description: Advanced prompting techniques using Amazon Bedrock models

codeExamples.title: AWS Bedrock Prompt Example
codeExamples.description: Example of crafting effective prompts for AWS Bedrock
codeExamples.code:
import boto3

# Initialize Bedrock client
bedrock = boto3.client('bedrock-runtime')

# Effective prompt for AWS service recommendations
prompt = """
You are an AWS Solutions Architect. A customer needs to build a serverless web application.

Provide a detailed recommendation including:
1. AWS services to use (Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, etc.)
2. Architecture diagram description
3. Cost optimization tips
4. Security best practices

Customer requirements:
- Handle 10,000 concurrent users
- Global deployment
- Real-time data processing
- Cost-effective solution
"""

# Use the prompt with Bedrock
response = bedrock.invoke_model(
    modelId='anthropic.claude-3-sonnet-20240229-v1:0',
    body=json.dumps({
        'prompt': prompt,
        'max_tokens_to_sample': 2000
    })
)

agents.title: Introduction to LangGraph
agents.description: Build stateful, graph-based AI agents with LangGraph for complex workflows.
agents.ollamaPrompt: You are a LangGraph specialist. Explain how to build graph-based agent workflows and manage complex state transitions.
samplePrompts: How do I create a simple graph workflow in LangGraph?
Explain state management in graph-based agents
What are the advantages of LangGraph over linear chains?
agents.setupInstructions: This agent uses CodeLlama for code-focused LangGraph discussions. Install 'codellama' model in Ollama. The agent specializes in graph architecture and stateful agent design.
